Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. (as of Nov 30,2022 06:14:53 UTC – Details)


iBUYPOWER Pro Gaming PC Computer Desktop TraceMR 252i (Intel Core i9 – 12900KF, GeForce RTX 3090 24 GB, 32GB DDR4 3200MHz , 1 TB NVMe SSD + 2 TB HDD, WiFi ready, Windows 11 Home).
System: iBUYPOWER TraceMR 252i Intel Core i9 – 12900KF 3.2GHz (Max 5.2GHz)|GeForce RTX 3090 24 GB | 32 GB 3200MHz DDR4 RAM | 1 TB NVMe SSD + 2 TB HDD| iBUYPOWER 240mm Liquid Cooling | Z690 Chipsset Motherboard| Genuine Windows 11 Home 64-bit
Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3090 24 GB Dedicated Gaming Video Card | VR Ready | 1x HDMI | 3x Display Port
Connectivity: 4 x USB 3.0 | 2 x USB 2.0 | 1x RJ-45 Network Ethernet 10/100/1000 | HD Audio Jacks: Line in / Front Speaker / Microphone
Special Add-Ons: 802.11AC Wi-Fi Included | Free iBuyPower Gaming Keyboard & RGB Gaming Mouse | No Bloatware | Warranty: 1 Year Parts & Labor + Free Lifetime US Tech Support | Assembled in the U.S.A

RGB | RADIANT. GORGEOUS. BEAUTIFUL

Illuminate and showcase your gaming rig’s internals with four RGB fans, designed to keep your system cool while you lock in for the grind ahead with the all-new iBUYPOWER Trace5MR Case.

TraceMR 252i

Since 1999, iBUYPOWER has been delivering on its promise to build the best gaming systems for the most discerning gamers. Even in a time when PCs were not as ubiquitous as they are today, we fueled the passion for gaming by giving our customers the highest quality in custom-built computers. Our systems have since become the backbone for professional gamers, game developers, LAN centers, major esports tournaments, and every day consumers.

iBUYPOWER TraceMR 252i

Extreme Performance Gaming PC

Introducing the iBUYPOWER TraceMR 252i! This system comes with the latest Intel i9-12900KF processor, a great value to performance CPU which will help run games at great frame rates. Booting up alongside the Intel i9-11900KF is an Nvidia GeForce RTX 3090 24 GB graphics card, this GPU is able to handle any modern AAA titles, 4K video editing, and other demanding tasks with no problem.

  • Intel i9-12900KF processor 3.2 GHz
  • Nvidia GeForce RTX 3090 24 GB
  • 32 GB DDR4 RAM RGB
  • 1 TB SSD
  • 2 TB HDD
  • 240mm RGB Liquid Cooler
  • WIFI Ready
  • VR Ready

Read more

Massive Power, Perfectly Balance

Intel i9-12900KF 3.2 GHz (5.2 GHz) CPU delivers the ultimate performance. With 8 Cores and 16 processing threads, whether you’re playing the latest games, designing the next skyscraper, or crunching scientific data, this CPU will be able to tickle any tasks.

Read more

Ultimate 8K Gaming

The GeForce RTX 3090 is a big ferocious GPU (BFGPU) with TITAN class performance. Power by Nvidia’s 2nd generation RTX architecture and with a staggering 24 GB of G6X memory, you can only get the ultimate gaming experience.

Read more

Jensen JE1913ACWM Widescreen 19″ Wallmount LCD 100-240V AC Television, specially built for Boats, Yacht, RV Recreational Vehicle, Trailer, Camper, Motor Home etc.
JENSEN…the ONLY Brand of TVs designed, engineered, tested & built exclusively for Over-The-Road Applications.
Enjoy functionality at its best with the JE1913AC. This Flat Panel JENSEN LCD TV boasts all the features you could ask for including an integrated HDTV tuner (1080p, 720p & 480p), 16:9 aspect ratio and high-contrast ratio. Brings home entertainment to the RV and take a quality entertainment experience wherever you go! Mount it on the Wall with a VESA 100mm x 100mm mounting pattern TV Mount. To round out this extensive feature set, the JE1913AC features various inputs and outputs.
Inputs/Outputs

  • Composite video input x 2 (NTSC/PAL)
  • Stereo audio input x 1
  • VGA with 3.5mm audio input x1
  • USB input x 1
  • RF x 1
  • HDMI input x 2
  • Selectable (variable/fixed) line level audio output (RCA) x1
  • IR output
  • SPDIF output
  • Headphone output


Specifications

  • Power System: AC 100-240V, 50/60Hz
  • Power Consumption: 42mA stand by, 2.7A max
  • Operating Temperature Range: -4°F to 149°F -20°C to 65°C
  • Storage Temperature Range: -22°F to 158°F -30°C to 70°C
  • Maximum Relative Humidity: 85%
  • Overall Dimensions: 18.03″ W x 12.08″ H x 2.06″ D
  • Product Weight:11 lbs
  • Regulatory Certification(s): FCC


Performance

  • Video / Display System: NTSC/ATSC/PAL
  • Video Input Signal (Composite): 1Vp-p @ 75 ohms
  • Audio Output: 6W x 2


LCD

  • Diagonal Size: 19″
  • Resolution: 1366 x 768
  • Brightness: 250 nit
  • Contrast Ratio: 1000 : 1
  • View Angles: Top 85°, Bottom 85°, Left 80°, Right 80°
  • Display Format: 16:9
  • Response Time: 3.5 ms

110V AC powered LCD AC Television, specially built for Boats, Yacht, RV Recreational Vehicle, Trailer, Camper, Motor Home etc., White LED illumination, 1366 x 768 full HD, Integrated HDTV (ATSC) tuner (1080p, 720p & 480p)
CEC function with AWM975 or other Jensen CEC-equipped HDMI DVD players (DVD Player Not Included), VESA 100mm x 100mm and 200mm x 400mm mounting pattern, Optional table top stand (STDJE1913) sold separately, Full function wireless remote control included
Convenient front controls, Conformal coated circuit boards, Rugged metal cabinet, Reinforced cabinet structure and mounting points. V-O rated front and rear cabinet materials which meets maximum UL/CUL safety certifications

Warranty & Support

User Manual Manual [PDF ] For warranty information about this product, please Click here [PDF ]

Price: $169.00 - $99.00
(as of Nov 29,2022 02:00:55 UTC – Details)


Control Your Comfort and Your Color Scheme, or use your tablet or computer. All you need is a Wi-Fi connection, or use the free app for smartphone/tablet to manage thermostat remotely and take advantage of savings when away and maintain comfort when home. Simple setup takes the hassle out of programming your thermostat. You can also control thermostat using the touch screen and change the background color to match your paint color or personal preference. Your RTH9585WF features flexible seven day programming, energy savings mode, an indoor humidity sensor, and voice command through the Total Connect Comfort app.
COMFORT COMES IN YOUR COLOR. Personalize your Wi-Fi Smart Color Programmable Thermostat to fit your décor.
SAVE ENERGY AND GET REWARDED by checking with your energy provider about available energy savings rebates to save on your purchase (use rebate finder link above). Plus, eligible customers can enroll in ongoing energy savings incentives with their energy provider to keep saving all year long.
YOUR SCHEDULE. YOUR WAY. Flexible programming options for your schedule or utility company’s peak rate pricing.
EASY OPERATION AND INTUITIVE. Bright, easy-to-read touchscreen makes for simple operation.
COMPATIBLE WITH: Forced air (gas, oil or electric), hot water and steam, and heat pumps with electric backup. Does NOT work with electric baseboard heat (120-240V). C-Wire required.
ENERGY STAR certified. Help save energy, track your heating and cooling with monthly energy reports and get personalized tips on reducing energy use.
Before purchasing, check to see if this thermostat is compatible with your home and to determine if your home needs a C-wire power adapter.
Works with most heat/cool oil furnace systems. Will not work with heating only oil furnace systems unless a C-Wire is present.

Customizable

A thermostat for your decor

The full-color display can be customized to fit your unique style, with color selection to match your home’s décor. Enjoy versatility and performance with this smart home thermostat.

This Wi-Fi Thermostat also allows you to create a custom temperature schedule for every day of the week. When schedules change, you can temporarily update the settings with ease. Plus, with it’s smart response technology, it learns your preferences, helping it achieve your preferred temperature when you need it.

App compatibility

You’re in control from anywhere

Choose from the Total Connect Comfort app or the Resideo app to control your Wi-Fi thermostat anytime, anywhere. You will also receive intelligent alerts, such as air filter and humidifier pad change reminders.

Easily connect your Wi-Fi Smart Color Thermostat with compatible voice assistant devices like Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, Microsoft Cortana, and more.

Next page

(as of Nov 29,2022 02:00:55 UTC – Details)
